Why order capoeira abadas in bulk from Dende Arts?

We make bulk ordering simple, predictable, and stress-free for capoeira schools and groups worldwide.

Premium, durable fabric that won't see through or wear out. Built to last through countless rodas and training sessions.

How does Bulk Ordering work?

1

Submit Your Request

Fill out the form below to let us know how many Abadas you need, the specific sizes, your deadline, and if you need a logo included.

2

Confirmation

We want this to be smooth. We'll reach out via phone or email to confirm your specific needs and ensure you get the best care possible.

3

Production

Once details are set, we start production immediately! Our typical fulfillment time for bulk orders is about 6 - 8 weeks.

4

Delivery

Your Abadas get shipped wherever you are in the world. Shipping costs are already included in your initial cost estimate.

What makes our Abadas different

I'v been praticing and teaching Capoeira since 2007. I noticed Abadas didn't fit anyone right!. But Iwanted people to feel great while thy move. So I decided to produce my own abadas for the community.

Durable, Opaque Fabric

Abadas made with Helanca are often very see-through. Our Abadas are made with premium, thicker material that keep you covered.

No-slip Elastic Waistband

Forget the constant adjustments. A secure, comfortable waistband means your pants stay up, no matter what. Focus on the game, not on your pants

Flattering Modern Fit

Designed for athletes, our modern jogger fit flatters most body type. Say goodbye to the awkward, tight in the wrong places, baggy in others look of traditional abadas. Say "oi!" to a style that feels as good as it looks.

High-Performance 4-Way Stretch

Our fabric has a high-quality 4-way stretch that provides maximum flexibility for unrestricted movement, unlike the cheap, flimsy material you're used to.
